title: Confused
body: A day ago someone came on my friends account and literally join 3 games and left, the thing i when he left his home he had left league **open** and when he got back the lost screen was there, the thing is the games he left were remade so how could there be a defeat screen? further more how the hell did someone get on his laptop? both me and him were literally baffled, has this happen to anyone else?

replies.body: Yea it definitely sounds like someone got onto your buddies computer and messed around on his account. Even if some of the games were remade, they probably entered into another game and the client was just left on the defeat screen when they were done messing around. I'd really suggest reminding your friend to close out their account to make sure someone doesn't mess with their inventory or get them penalized.

btw none got into my PC ever 
and i have my gmail bro ! 
how can it happend and the account gmail still with me !!!! 
and i send more than 5 tickets and still nothing !!!
but noway that somone from friends or somthing like that get into my account cuz i was already played before this about 3 hours ago !

i've sent more than 5 tickets about 12h ago with the same proplem played 5 or 6 games and go out 
when i back issue with client try to open my account again but said incorrect username or password
try to make recover for my account to send massege to my gmail 
until nw none massege sent 
what da hell can i de !
